summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Calendar System (Kalender) feature. Backend 100% (17/17 tests), Frontend 100%. All calendar features working: month/list views, navigation, search, tag filters, event detail modals, and admin CRUD operations.
passed_tests: API: GET /api/health - returns 200 OK
API: POST /api/auth/login - admin login with valid credentials
API: POST /api/auth/login - rejects invalid credentials
API: GET /api/events - returns public events
API: GET /api/events?month=1&year=2025 - filters by month/year
API: GET /api/events - correct response structure
API: GET /api/events - only returns public events
API: GET /api/events/tags - returns all unique tags
API: GET /api/admin/events - returns all events (admin)
API: GET /api/admin/events - rejects unauthenticated requests
API: POST /api/admin/events - creates event with all fields
API: PUT /api/admin/events/{id} - updates event
API: DELETE /api/admin/events/{id} - deletes event
API: PUT /api/admin/events/99999 - returns 404 for non-existent
API: DELETE /api/admin/events/99999 - returns 404 for non-existent
API: Event colors - all 8 colors (blue,gold,green,red,purple,pink,teal,orange) work
Frontend: Kalender page loads with month view
Frontend: Month navigation (prev/next buttons)
Frontend: Heute (Today) button
Frontend: Search functionality filters events
Frontend: View toggle (Grid/List)
Frontend: Tag filter panel opens with all tags
Frontend: Tag filter filters events correctly
Frontend: Event detail modal opens on click
Frontend: Event detail shows title, date, time, location, description, tags
Frontend: List view shows all events
Frontend: Events display with correct colors
Admin: Login redirects to admin panel
Admin: Kalender nav item in sidebar
Admin: Events list shows all events (including private)
Admin: 'Neues Event' button opens create modal
Admin: Create modal has all fields (title, description, dates, location, color picker, tags, visibility)
Admin: Event creation works
Admin: Edit/Delete buttons visible on event items
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper separation of concerns
Frontend uses proper React patterns (useState, useEffect, useMemo)
Color system well implemented with 8 color options
Tag filtering implemented correctly with comma-separated storage
context_for_next_testing_agent: Calendar feature fully implemented and tested. 4 test events in January 2025. Public calendar at /kalender, Admin events at /admin -> Kalender. All CRUD operations work. SQLite database in use.

public_calendar.month_view: Working - Shows 7x5 grid with German day names
public_calendar.tag_filter: Working - Shows all unique tags as filter buttons
public_calendar.event_modal: Working - Shows full event details with close button

admin_calendar.events_list: Working - Shows all events with edit/delete buttons
admin_calendar.create_event: Working - Modal with all fields, color picker, tags
admin_calendar.edit_event: Working - Pre-fills form with existing data

api_endpoints.GET /api/events: Working - Returns public events with filters
